item.title: Filtering vectors in R
item.description: 1 Motivation 2 Setup 3 Way 1: Base R 4 Way 2: magrittr 5 Way 3: tidyverse 6 Way 4: purrr 7 Conclusions 1 Motivation We have a vector and we want to filter it by name. 2 Setup library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching core tidyverse packages ──────────────────────── tidyverse 2.0.0 ── ## ✔ dplyr 1.1.2 ✔ readr 2.1.4 ## ✔ forcats 1.0.0 ✔ stringr 1.5.0 ## ✔ ggplot2 3.4.2 ✔ tibble 3.
